pallewela mihidupura pawathi mema sadayedi shampen wargayak panaya kala bawa kiyana pallewela polis murapale sewaya karana polis sarayanwarayaku ha kosthapalwarayaku da asadhya thaththawayen rohal gatha karanu laba athayi polis madhya prakashaka jyeshta polis adhikari ajith rohana mahatha prakasha karayi.pereda (26) rathri me siddhiyen miyagos aththe muddaragama wyaparikayakuwu senadhira aathawudage sarathchandra nohoth chuti mudalali (48) nam dedaru piyeku ha niwasiyawu thapal departhamenthuwe sewaya kala pallewela mihidu mawathe dharmasiri dasanayakage nihal (57) nam ekdaru piyeki.miyagiya nihal yana ayage niwase me sadaya pawathwa atha.
